name: Shuriken Jump
description:
Shuriken Jump
This game is a ninja game made by Japanese elementary school students.
If you hit the shuriken against the enemy, you can defeat the enemy, and if you hit the shuriken that bounces back, the ninja jumps excitingly.
Jump to avoid hitting enemies, avoid tricks and advance to the goal.
The goal is a Japanese castle.
On stage 2 and 3, scrolls appears. If you take a scroll with a shuriken, you can use ninja'stricks.
It will restart from the checkpoint until the time limit is reached.
(Story is only written in Japanese. I'm sorry.)

Method of operation

Arrow key → Move
Space key → Throw a shuriken                                                                                                      

Skip→SpaceKey

I want many people to play my special game.
Thank you  for  reading  the  passage  about  my  interesting game.

hayakichi

How to play
① Click Download
② Decompress and double click on hasamuyatu.exe in the Executable file folder
③ Press the Play button

※Please play without launching anything else, as it puts a load on the CPU.
